Question: Ben Shapiro of Townhall.com wrote: "this person is the most powerful woman in America.
Hints: "I understand why people think we're gay", this person says in the August 2006 issue of O magazine.
Late in 1996, this person introduced the Oprah's Book Club segment to her television show.
In the 1970s, this person had a romantic relationship with John Tesh.
